description:
Description


- Consistent Cooling from Start to Finish: The glucose in the pack absorbs surrounding heat during mixing, enhancing the cooling effect. Unlike traditional packs with high diatomite content, Linatural Modeling Pack contains over 50% glucose. This glucose cools as it mixes with water, providing intense cooling and soothing for 20 minutes, rapidly lowering skin temperature.
- Thorough Hydration with Moisture Lock: Glucose, a natural humectant with high hydrophilicity, delivers moisture deep into the skin layers. Its fine particles supply water between skin layers, creating a vacuum-like seal to effectively prevent moisture evaporation.
- Soothing and Pore Care: The combination of glucose and diatomite helps soothe the skin and improve pore care. The abundant glucose content cools the skin, supplies moisture, and creates a vacuum-like seal between the skin and the pack, enhancing its soothing and hydrating effects.
* 5 Types
Vegetable: Hydration & Soothing
Pink Salt: Moisturizing & Brightening
Tea Tree: Cooling & Soothing
Grain: Oil-Water Balance & Nourishment
Black Mud: Oil-Water Balance & Pore Care
How To Use

1. Fold the marked sections on the bottom and sides of the pouch to create handles before opening.

2. Shake the pouch to move the powder to the bottom, then cut along the indicated line.

3. Use the measuring spoon on the included spatula to add 7 spoons of water. Stir quickly with the spatula until the mixture becomes a paste.

4. Apply the paste with the spatula in the order of cheeks, jaw, forehead, and nose. After 15-20 minutes, remove the hardened pack and finish with a moisturizing product.

Description


Discover the power of rice and honey with our new wash-off mask, the Ground Rice and Honey Glow Mask. This mask harnesses the power of upcycled makgeolli lees, a byproduct of traditional Korean rice wine, to deliver potent skin benefits. Enriched with natural rice hull powder and 5% honey, it provides deep hydration, improves skin texture, and helps soothe inflammatory skin conditions like acne.


- Comprehensive Skin Care: All-in-One Mask
This all-in-one mask combines the benefits of brightening, antioxidant, moisturizing, improving skin elasticity, scrubbing, and soothing (cooling) effects. The synergy of upcycled makgeolli lees, honey, clay powder, and rice hull powder ensures thorough skin care in one step.


- Gentle Pore and Trouble Care

reviews.title: I love it
reviews.content: I've been using this clay mask once or twice a week, and I genuinely love how my skin feels afterward. It’s one of those products that gives you that “spa at home” vibe—cooling, detoxifying, and super satisfying. The texture is smooth and easy to apply. I usually leave it on for about 10 minutes, and I can feel it tightening slightly as it dries (but it’s not uncomfortably dry or cracking). After rinsing it off, my skin feels clean, soft, and looks visibly more matte without feeling stripped. What I really like is how it helps reduce the appearance of pores and controls oil, especially around my T-zone. I also noticed that it helps calm down small breakouts and prevent new ones from forming. It's made with natural ingredients, like kaolin and bentonite, and doesn't contain any harsh fragrances or alcohol, which is a huge plus for my sensitive skin.

reviews.title: لا بأس فيه ولكنه ليس الافضل
reviews.content: I recently tried a foam cleanser that I’d describe as decent, though not particularly exceptional. It has a nice, lightweight texture that creates a rich lather, making it enjoyable to use. It does a good job of cleansing the skin, removing surface dirt and excess oil without leaving it feeling overly dry or stripped. However, I didn’t notice any standout benefits or improvements in my skin after using it for a while. It’s gentle enough for daily use and works well as a basic cleanser, especially if you’re looking for something simple to add to your routine. The scent is pleasant and not too strong, which is a plus. The packaging is practical, and the amount of product is reasonable for the price. While it didn’t irritate my skin or cause any issues, it also didn’t deliver any noticeable results beyond basic cleansing. Overall, it’s a decent choice if you’re looking for a simple, no-frills foam cleanser, but there are more effective options available for a similar price. لا بأس بتجربته

original_name: [Mary&May] *mini* CICA TeaTree Soothing Wash off Pack 30g

description:
Description

Our pores are essentially pathways that sebum uses to reach the surface of our skin. When dead skin cells and surplus sebum clog these pathways, pores tend to enlarge. Proper pore care involves clearing away the built-up dead skin cells and sebum, followed by cooling the skin.

For this initial phase of skincare – pore and exfoliation care – we have harnessed ingredients from Earth, the cradle of our origin. Historically cherished red beans and kaolin have been chosen as key constituents. Kaolin effectively absorbs sebum, while red bean extract and powder assist in exfoliation and skin texture refinement.
Moist Clay Texture
The moisturizing soft mud formulation helps to absorb sebum and remove wastes without dryness or tightness. At the same time, it provides a refreshing cooling feeling.
Haenam red bean extract 30%
Red bean has been an important herbal ingredient throughout Korean history as well as a beloved skin care ingredient. Women of Joseon, who emphasized skin care that creates clear and clean skin, used mung beans and red beans ground together to wash their faces. The rich saponin in red beans helps with the adsorption of sebum and acts as a natural exfoliant.
How To Use
After cleansing, apply evenly on a dry face.
After 5-10 minutes, gently massage with lukewarm water and rinse off.

The Heartleaf O2 Bubble Wash-Off Mask Pack is a deep-cleansing mask designed to detoxify and purify the skin using heartleaf extract (5%). This mask generates oxygen bubbles that help remove impurities and dead skin cells, while also soothing the skin. It effectively brightens and clarifies the complexion, targeting blackheads, whiteheads, and excess sebum. The mask is ideal for individuals with sensitive skin, acne, or dull skin tone, providing a gentle yet powerful cleansing experience that leaves the skin feeling refreshed and rejuvenated. Suitable for use during both morning and evening routines, it can also be used by men as part of their shaving regimen to soothe and clean the skin. Removes impurities in the pores with 50,000ppm Houttuynia cordata soothes skin with Camellia sinensis

reviews.title: Good innovative product
reviews.content: Heartleaf O2 Bubble wash off maskpack:A powerful washoff mask which clears out pores with oxygen bubbles.It is infused with 50,000ppm Houttuynia cordata,green tea,olive leaf,zinc PCA,ascorbyl glucoside,thymus leaf extract,bay leaf extract & many powerful ingredients to clean skin effectively at the same time soothe & nourish.I loved using it as it’s my first time using such a unique innovative product.After use my skin felt so clean & smooth.I use it especially after I have been out the whole day to remove all the impurities & pollution my skin accumulated.Its a pefect match for my oily skin & it clears out my pores efficiently.I have been using it daily & I can already notice the difference.It made my skin smoother & gave it such a natural healthy glow.Also it doesn’t dry out my skin,infact after washing my skin feels soft & supple.I really had a good time using it & I will rate it 5 out of 5.

reviews.title: My favorite product to use
reviews.content: Hands downs my FAVORITE product out of these three. It’s probably the most fun product I own honestly (swipe to the end to hear it being swiped off). This is the first product I own with heartleaf in it (and ingredient I’ve been eyeing for my routine). It helps to clear out pores with the use of bubble formation and honestly it just feels really nice and fun. You’re supposed to apply to clean, dry skin and wait two minutes for bubbles to form. After that you rub it on your face again and wait another two minutes before rinsing. It changes from a gel consistency to an airy, shaving foam almost.

reviews.title: So much fun, and it works great
reviews.content: This mask is so, so, so cool, and so much fun, you spread this over your dry, clean skin, let the tiny bubbles appear and do their job. After a couple minutes you massage with finger tips. Then wait a few minutes and repeat, until there are no more bubbles, then rinse. This felt so awesome on my skin, it was so easy to use, comes in a really cute pump bottle, and has a light green/floral scent that I LOVE, but it is an added fragrance, so for those sensitive please be aware (be sure to wipe any stray bubbles off the dispenser when you are done) If you’re struggling with blackhead, whiteheads, oily skin, or honestly just love a good beneficial mask, try this. The oxygen bubbles do some great work

product_name: Patting Splash Mask Energy Citrus & Honey 150ml
description:
Description


Inspired by the Korean bathhouse tradition of splashing botanical steeped water onto the face after cleansing to tone and brighten skin, splash masks are a game-changing in-shower treatment. Just splash and pat onto the face for results in as little as 15 seconds. This liquid mask treatment delivers traditional moisturizing benefits along with gentle exfoliation. Formulated with a lactic acid blend and enriched with botanical extracts, the Energy Yellow Citrus & Honey Splash Mask reveals smoother skin and leaves the face feeling refreshed and glowing. It's formulated with citrus extracts and honey, aiding in brightening and energizing dull, tired skin.

Suggested Use


- Pour a capful of Splash Mask in the shower.
- Splash and pat on the face, avoiding the eye and lip area. 
- Use the water from the shower to splash and rinse off the face. 
- Repeat a few times. 
- After shower, follow with usual skin care steps.
- To use by the sink, pour a capful of Splash Mask into a clean bowl of water. (The ideal ratio of formula to water is 1:100, so a capful requires 700ml of water). 
- Stir with finger tips, then use to splash generously onto face. 
- Gently pat face until damp, not wet. 
- Follow with usual skin care steps. 
- Each bottle has enough formula for 30 uses.


Ingredients


Water, Lactic acid, Vaccinium Myrtillus Fruit Extract, PPG-26-Buteth-26, Gardenia Florida Fruit Extract, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Saccharum Officinarum (Sugarcane) Extract, 1,2-Hexanediol, Propylene Glycol, Panthenol, Dextrin, Sodium Lactate, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Fruit Extract, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Fruit Extract, Citrus Grandis (Grapefruit) Peel Oil, Acer Saccharum (Sugar Maple) Extract, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Oil, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Oil, Lavandula Hybrida Oil, Salvia Sclarea (Clary) Oil, Juniperus Mexicana Oil, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Oil, Santalum Album (Sandalwood) Oil, Honey Extract(20ppm)

reviews.title: LOVE IT!
reviews.content: I love using it in the shower. Fast and effective. No problems despite having sensitive skin. I've repurchased many times (and gifted it many times as well!)

reviews.title: Must try!!
reviews.content: I was skeptical of this when I first saw it. I didn’t think something that I only left on my skin for 15 seconds would have any noticeable effect. But it did! It leaves my skin feeling very smooth and fresh. I use it in the following way: at the end of my shower before I get out (my face has already been double cleansed) I empty a capful into my palm and splash it on my face and décolletage making sure to keep my eyes closed. I then count to 15 seconds and rinse my face under the water. I’ve tried all three types of the splash mask and the green one of hands down the best one with the most noticeable results.
